title: Elementary Mathematics Job Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Emotion-Based e-Learning and Energy Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics curriculum knowledge and at least 3 years of educational field experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring emotion-based learning strategies and energy learning techniques applicable in real classrooms by elementary school teachers. Blends online platforms and offline workshops to promote self-directed experiential learning.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze individual emotional responses using emotion recognition tools and design personalized mathematics teaching strategies.
Learners develop at least three types of mathematics activities applying energy learning principles on a gamified e-learning platform.
Learners achieve at least 80% monthly learning progress and emotional engagement through a self-directed learning log system.
Learners finalize two mathematics education scenarios reflecting peer feedback as deliverables in a blended environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
